scripts.lint: npm run lint:okta-hosted-login && npm run lint:custom-login
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test:unit && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:okta-hosted-login: export TEST_TYPE=implicit || setx TEST_TYPE "implicit" && protractor protractor.conf.js --sample=okta-hosted-login
scripts.test:custom-login: export TEST_TYPE=implicit || setx TEST_TYPE "implicit" && protractor protractor.conf.js --sample=custom-login
scripts.test:e2e: npm run test:okta-hosted-login && npm run stop && npm run test:custom-login
scripts.test:unit: npm run test --prefix okta-hosted-login/ && npm run test --prefix custom-login/
scripts.pretest-legacy: npm run webdriver-update-legacy && npm run setup-env
scripts.postinstall: npm install --prefix custom-login && npm install --prefix okta-hosted-login
scripts.build:okta-hosted-login: cd ./okta-hosted-login && npm install --production=false && PUBLIC_URL=/okta-hosted-login npm run build
scripts.build:custom-login: cd ./custom-login && npm install --production=false && PUBLIC_URL=/custom-login npm run build
scripts.build: npm run build:okta-hosted-login && npm run build:custom-login
